name: Home and Afraid
description:
Home and Afraid is  a first-person horror game, which is played on PC. It is like a lot of indie horror games, with its style and simple nature. I based the idea loosely from my own early life and I added a horror creepy feel to it.

You’re a 12-year-old boy, named Liam. you live in a small 2-bedroom flat which you share with your mother. She has gone out and left a note on the fridge, as soon as you read it you hear a noise at the door, you walk over and look through the peep hole, nothing will be there. The objective updates telling you to relax so you sit on the couch and watch TV, time passes, and you hear another noise at the door, you look through the peep hole and see a figure run by the door. The objective will update and tell you to call mum, you only have a landline because "you are too young to need a phone" but as soon as you get to the phone the power goes out and lights begin to flicker, the objective updates and tells you to check all the windows to see if they are locked, then you will remeber you havent checked the off limits room so you do...

Play to find out more ;)
